cannotEraseOthersPixels: You can only erase your own pixels!

helpUserFeaturesText:

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Permission Management: Strict permission control, only edit your own pixels, protecting others' creations
ğŸ’¾ Incremental Saving: Smart saving mechanism, only transmits new pixel data, greatly improving performance
ğŸ“Š Pixel Tracking: System precisely tracks every pixel added by users, optimizing storage and loading efficiency
âš¡ Status Sync: Real-time display of unsaved changes status, with auto-save to prevent data loss
ğŸ’¿ Manual Save: Support save button click or Ctrl+S shortcut to immediately save all new pixels
ğŸ”„ Data Refresh: Click load button to fetch latest collaborative data from cloud
ğŸŒ Four-Chunk System: Advanced chunk division technology optimizing large-scale pixel data management

aboutProjectText: SAR Map Pixel is a modern collaborative pixel art platform supporting real-time multi-user drawing. Built with advanced four-chunk system architecture, each pixel is 16x16 in size, providing smooth drawing experience. Users have independent identity authentication with cross-device access, and can only edit their own pixel artworks. All data is synchronized through LeanCloud cloud services in real-time, ensuring data security and consistency.
aboutAIText: This project is 100% autonomously developed by artificial intelligence, covering Vue 3 frontend architecture design, responsive UI interface, user interaction logic, cloud data management, multi-language internationalization, performance optimization and other full-stack features. It demonstrates the exceptional capabilities of modern AI in complex web application development, from requirement analysis and architecture design to code implementation, completely completed independently by AI.
aboutOpenSourceText: The project adopts MIT open source license with fully open code: github.com/LoXidEv/SARMapPixel Core Tech Stack: â€¢ Frontend: Vue 3 + Composition API â€¢ Build: Vite + Modern Toolchain â€¢ Cloud: LeanCloud Database â€¢ I18n: Vue I18n Multi-language Support Welcome developers to contribute code, submit issues, or participate in feature discussions!
aboutTestingText: This platform serves as a technical demonstration and testing environment, primarily showcasing AI development capabilities and technical features. While it has complete functionality, long-term data persistence is not guaranteed. It is recommended for learning, testing, or temporary creative purposes. We will perform regular system maintenance and data cleanup, so please save important works promptly.
aboutTechnologyText:
ğŸ¨ Drawing System:
â€¢ 16x16 pixel block drawing for detailed creative experience
â€¢ Smart color management with automatic common color recording
â€¢ Multi-tool support: brush, eraser, color picker
â€¢ Real-time preview and coordinate display

ğŸ—ï¸ Four-Chunk Architecture:
â€¢ Intelligent chunk division optimizing large canvas performance
â€¢ On-demand loading mechanism reducing 93.75% network requests
â€¢ Independent caching system improving response speed
â€¢ Error isolation - single chunk failure doesn't affect overall system

â˜ï¸ Cloud Collaboration:
â€¢ LeanCloud real-time data synchronization
â€¢ Incremental saving, only transmitting new pixels
â€¢ Cross-device data consistency guarantee
â€¢ Smart conflict handling mechanism

ğŸ›¡ï¸ User Experience:
â€¢ Independent user identity system
â€¢ Permission isolation - only edit your own pixels
â€¢ Complete multi-language support (CN/EN/TC)
â€¢ Responsive design adapting to various devices
â€¢ Comprehensive error handling and retry mechanisms
